	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

* **Region of Delivery**: N/A

**Scope of Work**

The FCC legal team seeks a contractor to provide contract legal counsel to supplement the in-house legal team on an as-needed basis. The contractor may be required to backfill a resourcing gap within the in-house team or to supplement the team to complete a specific project or provide specific practice area knowledge.

**Instructions for Submission**

Bidding and documents are available on the MERX website at http://www.merx.com. A fee may apply; please refer to the MERX pricing page for information on fees. Prospective contractors are encouraged to review the tender package carefully before submitting their bid.
